hotspots.hotspot:
Evaporation

Evaporation is the process by which water changes from a liquid to a gas. During the water cycle, energy from the sun heats the surface of the ocean or other bodies of water. Some of the liquid water evaporates from these bodies of water and enters the atmosphere as a gas called water vapor.

Transpiration

Water enters the atmosphere as a result of transpiration, the process in which water vapor is released from plants.
